Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor:




Nemesis Enforcer looked at his wings.  He yelled out in complete anger, 
stomping a foot.  "RUINED!  GREAT!  SOMEONE NEEDS TO DIE!"

Scattershot looked over his "Soundwave/Stalker" style armor, full of holes 
and gashes, mech-fluid sticking to his body.  "Same here.  Luckily my helmet 
wasn't damaged!" (I can't remember the guy's head that is his helmet!  I 
don't believe it)

"Look over here, guys!" Serpentor said, his plasma launcher pointed at a 
metallic body.  The king cobra watched the other two Alliance members limp 
over Diskus, each standing a few feet away from him.

Nemesis Enforcer looked around, seeing flames in the trees, starting to take 
out what was left of the forest near the Alliance base.  Nemesis would have 
to have Pyro burn the rest down so no one could try and sneak up on the base. 
 The autoguns were off, and Nemesis could smell the mech-fluid.

Looking down on the unconscious Diskus, supposedly unconscious that is, 
Nemesis Enforcer laughed, raising his weapon.  "I didn't get to kill anyone.  
This idiot will have to do." the Alliance member chuckled madly as he pulled 
the trigger to his rapid-firing laser rifle, twenty-five rapid bolts of red 
laser fire heading down at Diskus' torso.

"Wait, Nemesis!" Serpentor yelled.  "Shouldn't we take him prisoner for 
interrogation?"

"Well, as second in command for the Alliance, I'd say yes.  But as a 
psychotic Predacon, I'd say waste him!" Nemesis yelled, throwing his head 
back in evil laughter.

Serpentor laughed, firing off a blast from his plasma launcher at Diskus.

Scattershot kept quiet, firing off twenty five shells down at Diskus.
